com.clarionmedia.infinitum.di

Interface BeanPostProcessor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AutowiredBeanPostProcessor

    public interface BeanPostProcessor

    Allows for beans to be modified after they are initialized by the container.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 07/05/12
    Author:
    Tyler Treat

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void postProcessBean(InfinitumContext context, AbstractBeanDefinition beanDefinition)
      Invoked on the given AbstractBeanDefinition after it has been initialized.

    • Method Detail

      • postProcessBean

        void postProcessBean(InfinitumContext context,
                   AbstractBeanDefinition beanDefinition)
        Invoked on the given AbstractBeanDefinition after it has been initialized.
        Parameters:
        context - the InfinitumContext the given bean is registered with
        beanDefinition - the AbstractBeanDefinition to post process
